text: The 2015 FIS Ski Jumping Grand Prix was the 22nd Summer Grand Prix season in ski jumping on plastic for men and the 4th for ladies. Other competitive circuits this season included the World Cup, Continental Cup, FIS Cup, FIS Race and Alpen Cup. == Calendar == === Men === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff;
